name: Special Topics in Environment
description: Special topics course designed for students in School of the Environment programs. Content in any given year depends on instructor. Will be offered in 2018-19 on the subject area of religion and environment. See School of the Environment website for more details.
prerequisites: Students must have completed a minimum of 9.0 FCEs to register for the course.
exclusions: BIG101Y1 if ENV382H1 taken in 2015-16 or 2016-17
